short_summary: Purchase of a Microbiological Analysis Automation System
description: Request to purchase a fully functional automated system for microbiological analysis in Sherbrooke, QC
full_summary:
---

**Title (English):** Acquisition of a Microbiological Analysis Automation System - RFP
**Title (French):** Achats d'un Système pour l’automatisation des analyses microbiologiques - DDP

**Reference Number:** WS3693037503-Doc3721570542
**Solicitation Number:** WS3693037503
**RFP Edition:** 4th Edition

**Publication Date:** October 25, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** December 13, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
**Expected Contract Start Date:** Not Specified
**Expected Contract End Date:** March 1, 2024

**Procurement Method:** Competitive Bidding (Open Tender)
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Commodity:** Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Microbiology Devices (UNSPC: 41100000, 41171600)
**Regions of Delivery:** Sherbrooke, Quebec, Canada
**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
**Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, Canada K1A 0S5

**Contact Information:** Alina Cocieru (SPAC/PSPC)
- Email: [alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- Phone: Not Available
- Fax: Not Available

**Notice URL:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14458338?extsite=MTQ0NTgzMzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14458338?extsite=MTQ0NTgzMzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Description:** This request for proposal is for the acquisition, delivery, and installation of a Microbiological Analysis Automation System for the Sherbrooke Research and Development Centre. All bid submissions must be received no later than 2:00 PM EST on December 13, 2022. Any bids submitted after this deadline will not be considered.

**Attachments:** None

**Note:** This Request for Proposal is now closed. It was published by the Public Services and Procurement Canada (TPSGC) on behalf of Agriculture and
